overview: Todd is a hyper-articulate, obsessive compulsive gay twentysomething whose fear of dying alone leads him to a baffling conclusion: he might not be gay after all. When he meets Rory, a whip-smart struggling actress with her own set of insecurities, the two forge a relationship thatâ€™s all talk and no sex.
tagline: He might be gay. She might not care.
title: Straight Up
